traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the abishai's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The abishai has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The abishai's weapon attacks are magical.

traits.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the abishai can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The abishai makes two attacks: one with its longsword and one with its claw.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 8 (1d10 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d4 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) cold damage.
